about.introOne: Mā Scratch, ka taea e koe te waehere ō ake kōrero, kēmu, hākorikori hoki, ka taea hoki te tuari i ngā mea kua waihangatia ki ngā tāngata o te hāpori Scratch.
about.introTwo: Mā Scratch e āwhina i ngā taiohi ki te whakaaro auaha, ki te whakaaro nahanaha, ki te mahi tahi hoki - ngā pukenga nui mō te rau tau 21.
about.introThree: Ko Scratch tētahi o ngā hinonga o te Lifelong Kindergarten Group o te MIT Media Lab. Kāore he utu mō Scratch.
about.whoUsesScratchDescription: Kua waihangatia a Scratch kia tika mō ngā tamariki 8 ki te 16,  engari ka whakamahia e ngā tāngata ahakoa te pakeke. E hia miriona ngā tāngata ka hanga i ngā hinonga Scratch, i ngā wāhi mahi, i ngā kāinga,  i ngā kāinga, ngā whare taonga, ngā puna kōrero me ngā whare hāpori.
about.aroundTheWorldDescription: Ka whakamahia a Scratch i ngā whenua nui ake i te 150, ka whakamahia i ngā reo 40 nui ake rānei. Hurihia te reo mā te tahua reo kei raro i te whārangi nei. I te Etita Hinonga, pāwhiritia te tohu ao kei runga. Ki te tāpiri, ki te panoni rānei i ngā kupu  tirohia te whārangi{translationLink}.
about.quotesDescription: Kua whiwhi mātou Te Tīma Scratch i ngā īmēra maha, mai i ngā taiohi, ngā mātua me ngā kaiako e mihi mai mō Scratch. Kia kite ake i ngā kōrero, pānuitia ngā karere  kei konei: {quotesLink}.
about.literacy: Ako i te Waehere, Whakawaehere ki te Ako
about.literacyDescription: Ko tētahi o ngā momo akoranga pānui nui o tēnei ao, ko te āhei ki te waehere i ngā papatono rorohiko. Mā te ako i a Scratch, ka ako hoki ki ngā rautaki nui mō te whakaoti rapanga, te hoahoa hinonga me te whakawhitiwhiti whakaaro.
about.schoolsDescription: Kei te ako ngā akonga Scratch i ngā taumata katoa (o ngā kura me ngā wānanga), i ngā marau karo  (pāngarau, hangarau matihiko, ngā reo, tikanga-ā-iwi me ngā mea kē atu). Ka whakawhiti kōrero, tuari rauemi, whakaputa pātai, kimi tāngata i runga o {scratchedLink}.
about.researchDescription: Kei te rangahau mātou te MIT Scratch Team, me ō mātou hoa mahi kia mōhio pēhea ngā tāngata e whakamahi, e ako hoki i a Scratch (hei tīmatanga, tirohia {spfaLink}). Mō ngā akoranga Scratch anō tirohia{researchLink} me {statisticsLink}.
about.supportDescription: Nā ēnei rōpū: {supportersList} i tuku pūtea ki te Hinonga Scratch. Tirohia {creditsLink} mō ngā whakamārama. Ki te hiahia koe ki te āwhina i a Scratch, tirohia te whārangi Scratch Foundation {donateLink}, whakapā mai rānei ki a mātou ki {donateemail}.
